select
distinct
from RISK_ARCHIVES
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into RISK_ARCHIVES (ARCHIVES_ID, ACCT_ID, RISK_LEVEL, STATUS, SCORE, COMMENTS, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, BIZ_CODE, TRANS_ID, TRANS_VOL, UUID, BIZ_CATEGORY, CHECK_ID, DEAL_WAY, CONTROL_STATUS, SOURCE, CHECK_STATUS, BANK, OID_PARTNER, USER_LOGIN, USERS_ID, VERIFY_CODE, NOTIFY_CODE, CONTROL_SCODE, CONTROL_FCODE, MACHINE_ID, IS_AML, DEPT_ID, OPERATOR, OPER_TIME, TRANS_IP, TRADE_STATUS, CURRENCY, MOBILE_ATTRIBUTION, IP_ATTRIBUTION, MAC, DEVICE_NUM, MER_ORDER_ID, DEPT_REQUEST_NUM, REFUND_AMOUNT, REFUND_NUM ) values (#{archivesId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{acctId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{riskLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{score,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bizCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transVol,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bizCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dealWay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{controlStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{source,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{checkStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{bank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oidPartner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userLogin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usersId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{verifyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{notifyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{controlScode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{controlFcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{machineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isAml,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{transIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobileAttribution,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ipAttribution,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptRequestNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refundAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{refundNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )

update RISK_ARCHIVES

ACCT_ID = #{record.acctId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RISK_LEVEL = #{record.riskLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
